name.ja: フル・アーマード・エクシーズ

text.en:
If an Xyz Monster is on the field: Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Xyz Monster you control; equip 1 other Xyz Monster from your face-up field or GY to it as an Equip Spell with these effects.
● The equipped monster gains ATK equal to this card's.
● If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.
